entry.content:

Oct 10, 21:05 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 03/11/2022 13:00 UTC
End time : 03/11/2022 14:00 UTC

Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be updating our network equipment.

entry.title: [MRS][Network] - Backbone latencies
entry.content:
Oct 20, 08:08 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 19/10/2022 01:00 UTC
End Time : 20/10/2022 07:00 UTC
Service status :Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Oct 20, 00:37 UTC
Update - Please be advised that work is still ongoing. Our provider has spliced part of the fibers and are still working on the rest. Our Field Engineer is assisting them in order to make the process faster and accurate. No ETR can be provided yet.

Oct 19, 19:17 UTC
Update - Update : The welding is still going on and will continue during the night.

Oct 19, 17:37 UTC
Update - Update : The provider's teams have installed the new splice boxes and are currently welding them.

Oct 19, 15:03 UTC
Update - Update : The provider's teams have identified the location of the outage. The provider's technicians are sent to identify the precise location and nature of the fault.

Oct 19, 10:14 UTC
Identified - Start time : 19/10/2022 01:00 UTC
Service impact : The traffic is currently rerouted in part which causes more latency and saturation on the traffic coming from Marseille to OVHcloud Datacenters.
Root cause : A fiber cut has been detected between Marseille and Paris.
Ongoing actions : Our team located the fiber cut. An intervention is on site to address the issue.

Oct 19, 07:06 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 19/10/2022 01:00 UTC
Service impact : The traffic is currently rerouted in part which causes more latency and saturation on the traffic coming from Marseille to OVHcloud Datacenters.
Root cause : A fiber cut has been detected between Marseille and Paris.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently working on the issue to solve the incident. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.
